definitions.definition: The state or quality of being irritable ; quick excitability .
A natural susceptibility , characteristic of all living organisms, tissues, and cells, to the influence of certain stimuli , response being manifested in a variety of ways.
A condition of morbid excitability of an organ or part of the body; undue susceptibility to the influence of stimuli.

main_definition: The state or quality of being irritable ; quick excitability .
secondary_definitions: ( physiology ) A natural susceptibility , characteristic of all living organisms, tissues, and cells, to the influence of certain stimuli , response being manifested in a variety of ways.
( medicine ) A condition of morbid excitability of an organ or part of the body; undue susceptibility to the influence of stimuli.
